original_text: But you shall present a food offering to the Lord for seven days. On the seventh day is a holy convocation; you shall not do any ordinary work.”
korean_text: 너희는 이레 동안 여호와께 화제를 드릴 것이요 일곱째 날에도 성회로 모이고 아무 노동도 하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: But you shall present a food offering to the Lord for seven days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 이레 동안 주께 식물 제물을 드릴 것이니라.

sentences.original_text: On the seventh day is a holy convocation
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱째 날에는 거룩한 성회가 있을 것이니라.

sentences.original_text: you shall not do any ordinary work.”
